name: Project 4
description:
Web app that won 1st place in the Tanda 2016 hackathon.

Project 4 links the Fitbit fitness API with the Tanda timekeeping API to gamify exercise in the workplace while providing useful analytics to employers.

name: Robogals UQ Website
description: Designed and developed the new Robogals UQ website. The source code is available here

name: Household Manager
description:
Household Manager, nicknamed 'Nanshan', is a webapp that manages household expenses and split bills between flatmates. The backend is made in Django and has unit tests which are ran through Travis CI when changes are pushed and coverage reports are generated by CodeCov.

The frontend is written in VueJS, with a Material Design framework. The frontend makes use of service workers to cache the content for offline access and faster loading and web manifests are used to give the app a native feel on Android.
